duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare wafers for experimentation, including cleaning and loading, and clean reactors.
Operate thin film process and scanning electron microscope (SEM) for analysis and imaging.
Record process conditions and experimental observations, as well as prepare graphs and tables summarizing results.
Order equipment and supplies, coordinate with vendors and purchasing, and perform routine shut down procedures.
Coordinate instrument repair and maintenance, as well as set up equipment for experiments.
Interface with requestors, communicate on results, and help monitor wafer in process (WIP) and maintain throughput.
Use quantitative wafer evaluation and process instrumentation knowledge.
